name: PharmaMOOC
overview:
PharmaMOOC is the first Massive Open Online Course (MOOC) provider for the pharmaceutical and biomedical manufacturing sector.

PharmaMOOC is a collaborative effort between the School of Chemical & Pharmaceutical Sciences at the Dublin Institute of Technology, and pharmaceutical manufacturing educators DPS Education & Training. It provides participants with a 3 week online course “”Introduction to Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Technologies“. The course is a social entrepreneurship venture which is made available to individuals located anywhere in the world.

Futher details about the courses available and the planned commencement of intake can be accessed at www.pharmamooc.com

external_links.title: DIT goes live with first Irish MOOC (Massive Open Online Course)
